channel.title: Website Help
channel.description:
I want to know how to add that page on a website that makes you HAVE to accept to the terms of service or whatever to get onto the website.
Some help please :)

item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

Haha thanks that was alot of help im good with java programming but when it comes to any Html, c++ codeing or anything im poop. i have no idea how to MAKE the page in the first place ! its not like im just asking for help and not doing im reading everything on that website u linked to me and im tryint it on my own.

The only flaw i can think of is im useing a free website i might have to use a paid website wich i can not do untill saturday

Read full topic

item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I have no idea what your second sentence means… But basically you just set a cookie on the terms acceptance, then every other page checks to see if that cookie exists. If that cookie doesn’t exist, it redirects to the TOS.

http://www.w3schools.com/php/php_cookies.asp <- For setting/reading the cookie

header('Location: http://www.yoursite.com/TOS_PAGE.php'); //Redirects

Read full topic
